021import com.velocitypowered.api.proxy.messages.MinecraftChannelIdentifier;
022import com.velocitypowered.api.proxy.server.RegisteredServer;
023import net.tnemc.bungee.ProxyProvider;
024import net.tnemc.bungee.message.MessageManager;
025import net.tnemc.bungee.message.backlog.BacklogEntry;
026import net.tnemc.bungee.message.backlog.MessageData;
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028
029import java.util.Optional;
030
031/**
032 * VelocityProxy
033 *
034 * @author creatorfromhell
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public class VelocityProxy implements ProxyProvider {
038
039  /**
040   * Used to send data to every server that is not this server.
041   *
042   * @param channel The channel to use for sending the data.
043   * @param out     The data to send.
044   */
045  @Override
046  public void sendToAll(final String channel, final byte[] out, final boolean backlog) {
047
048    VelocityCore.instance().getServer().getAllServers().forEach(server->{
049      if(!server.getPlayersConnected().isEmpty()) {
050        server.sendPluginMessage(MinecraftChannelIdentifier.from(channel), out);
051      } else {
052
053        if(backlog) {
054          MessageManager.instance().addData(String.valueOf(server.getServerInfo().getAddress().getPort()), new BacklogEntry(channel, out));
055        }
056      }
057    });
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Used to send data to a specific server.
062   *
063   * @param serverName The server name.
064   * @param channel    The channel to use for sending the data.
065   * @param out        The data to send.
066   */
067  @Override
068  public void sendTo(final String serverName, final String channel, final byte[] out) {
069
070    final Optional<RegisteredServer> server = VelocityCore.instance().getServer().getServer(serverName);
071    server.ifPresent(registeredServer->registeredServer.sendPluginMessage(MinecraftChannelIdentifier.from(channel), out));
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Used to send any backlog data to a server.
076   *
077   * @param data The {@link MessageData} to use for determining the server, and backlog to send.
078   */
079  @Override
080  public void sendBacklog(@NotNull final MessageData data) {
081
082    for(final RegisteredServer server : VelocityCore.instance().getServer().getAllServers()) {
083      if(server.getServerInfo().getAddress().getPort() == Integer.valueOf(data.getServerName())) {
084        for(final BacklogEntry entry : data.getBacklog()) {
085          server.sendPluginMessage(MinecraftChannelIdentifier.from(entry.channel()), entry.out());
086        }
087      }
088    }
089  }
090}
